data.text:
That was elegant and unique design like as Arabian design . 
It has a very prime location in the main boulevard in downtown ( the best location)
With very helpful and skilled and kind staff
Bed was so comfortable and There was a pleasant smell everywhere
In addition pool and hotel’s restaurants were admirable 
Every things was fine، 
Including negative points The washing sink was not very  clean , stand shower it was not very comfort,  but The worst point was that the room was not clean  The carpet in the room was not swept at all  and I expected more for a hotel with this high score and this price
data.title: beautiful and prim location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Mohammad B!
Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your time reviewing us here. I'm thrilled to read your generous feedback and will make sure to relay the message to the teams in order to ensure we keep valued guests like yourself delighted. Maintaining a clean atmosphere within our guest rooms and common areas is important and I apologize that we did not fulfill that expectation during your visit.  Please know that I have shared your comments with our team as we continuously enhance our product whenever possible. We hope to welcome you back soon at The Heritage Hotel!

Regards,   
Asad Haroon
General Manager
owner_response.author: Asaad Haroon

data.text: Great experience! Youcef and Albanna are super friendly and took the time to explain flavours of shisha to us :) Mum was a first time shisha smoker and felt super comfortable giving it a try and they changed flavours when she didn’t like with no problem at all. Best service!
data.title: Love this hotel!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Tan T!
Thank you for choosing Courtyard at The Heritage Hotel. I'm so glad to know that you had a great time and our team especially Youcef and Albanna provided you with excellent service. I will make sure to relay the message to the teams in order to ensure we keep valued guests like yourself delighted. We hope to welcome you back soon at The Heritage Hotel!
Regards,

data.text: I have been in the Courtyard, I love the food during the Iftar !!!  The food selection , fresh , healthy options and tasteful with an outdoor seating ! The place is cozy with great vibes !!! I highly recommend for a friends , family Iftar during the Ramadan! I will definitely coming back !!!
data.title: Always my favorite place!!! Love itttt!!! ❤️

data.text:
Great place to come and relax, take in some sports, have a great meal and be looked after by amazing staff like Abishek!

The team are super accommodating and the food is always good. Happy hours are definitely worth a visit.

The location is so central and easy to get to that it makes it the best choice for sport in Downtown.
data.title: Hidden Gem

data.text:
very cozy place! i love to come here with my friends for shisha. good service! thanks waiter Omran, he was very kind and polite to us 🙏🏻🙏🏻
i will come again to enjoy 
and really like atmosphere 
so i’m sure that i can recommend this place!!!👍🏻
data.title: amazing place
